contents: 美国失业率下降从奥巴马时期就开始了，川普上任后这个下降率并没有显著改变，所以应该和川普的政策没什么关系：https://www.google.com/search?biw=1918&bih=1009&ei=kjG9XafUCoTVmAWu2oTQDw&q=unemployment+of+usa&oq=unemployment+of+usa&gs_l=psy-ab.3..0i13j0i13i10i30j0i8i13i10i30j0i8i13i30j0i8i7i30l2j0i13i5i10i30j0i13i5i30j0i8i13i10i30l2.4489.5367..5568...0.0..0.225.225.2-1......0....1..gws-wiz.tus_R59ujlQ&ved=0ahUKEwin5ZLtgcvlAhWEKqYKHS4tAfoQ4dUDCAs&uact=5
